title: Smokin' With the Cigar Authority and Xikar
itunes:title: Smokin' With the Cigar Authority and Xikar
description: David and Mr. Jonathan put themselves and the shows equipment to the test in the direct sun.  They light up and smoke HC cigars with co-owner Scott Almsberger and discus the Xikar brand and products.  Later they sit with Smithfest Director Fred Smith and discus his charity while they light up Perdomo's newest creation The Camaroon Reserva.  All this and more on the Cigar Authority!
